013package org.apache.juneau.rest.stats;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import java.util.*;
017import java.util.concurrent.atomic.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.marshaller.*;
023
024/**
025 * Represents an entry in {@link ThrownStore}.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
028 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jrs.ExecutionStatistics">REST method execution statistics</a>
029 * </ul>
030 */
031public class ThrownStats implements Cloneable {
032
033   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
034   // Static
035   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
036
037   /**
038    * Static creator.
039    *
040    * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
041    * @return A new builder for this object.
042    */
043   public static Builder create(BeanStore beanStore) {
044      return new Builder(beanStore);
045   }
046
047   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
048   // Builder
049   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
050
051   /**
052    * Builder class.
053    */
054   @FluentSetters
055   public static class Builder {
056
057      final BeanStore beanStore;
058      Throwable throwable;
059      long hash;
060      List<String> stackTrace;
061      ThrownStats causedBy;
062
063      BeanCreator<ThrownStats> creator;
064
065      /**
066       * Constructor.
067       *
068       * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
069       */
070      protected Builder(BeanStore beanStore) {
071         this.beanStore = beanStore;
072         this.creator = beanStore.createBean(ThrownStats.class).builder(Builder.class, this);
073      }
074
075      /**
076       * Create a new {@link ThrownStats} using this builder.
077       *
078       * @return A new {@link ThrownStats}
079       */
080      public ThrownStats build() {
081         return creator.run();
082      }
083
084      /**
085       * Specifies a subclass of {@link ThrownStats} to create when the {@link #build()} method is called.
086       *
087       * @param value The new value for this setting.
088       * @return This object.
089       */
090      @FluentSetter
091      public Builder type(Class<? extends ThrownStats> value) {
092         creator.type(value == null ? ThrownStats.class : value);
093         return this;
094      }
095
096      /**
097       * Specifies the thrown exception.
098       *
099       * @param value The new value for this setting.
100       * @return This object.
101       */
102      @FluentSetter
103      public Builder throwable(Throwable value) {
104         this.throwable = value;
105         return this;
106      }
107
108      /**
109       * Specifies the calculated hash.
110       *
111       * @param value The new value for this setting.
112       * @return This object.
113       */
114      @FluentSetter
115      public Builder hash(long value) {
116         this.hash = value;
117         return this;
118      }
119
120      /**
121       * Specifies the normalized stacktrace.
122       *
123       * @param value The new value for this setting.
124       * @return This object.
125       */
126      @FluentSetter
127      public Builder stackTrace(List<String> value) {
128         this.stackTrace = value;
129         return this;
130      }
131
132      /**
133       * Specifies the caused-by exception.
134       *
135       * @param value The new value for this setting.
136       * @return This object.
137       */
138      @FluentSetter
139      public Builder causedBy(ThrownStats value) {
140         this.causedBy = value;
141         return this;
142      }
143
144      // <FluentSetters>
145
146      // </FluentSetters>
147   }
148
149   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
150   // Instance
151   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
152
153   private final long guid;
154   private final long hash;
155   private final Class<?> thrownClass;
156   private final String firstMessage;
157   private final List<String> stackTrace;
158   private final Optional<ThrownStats> causedBy;
159
160   private final AtomicInteger count;
161   private final AtomicLong firstOccurrence, lastOccurrence;
162
163   /**
164    * Constructor.
165    *
166    * @param builder The builder for this object.
167    */
168   protected ThrownStats(Builder builder) {
169      this.guid = new Random().nextLong();
170      this.thrownClass = builder.throwable.getClass();
171      this.firstMessage = builder.throwable.getMessage();
172      this.stackTrace = listBuilder(builder.stackTrace).copy().unmodifiable().build();
173      this.causedBy = Utils.opt(builder.causedBy);
174      this.hash = builder.hash;
175      this.count = new AtomicInteger(0);
176      long ct = System.currentTimeMillis();
177      this.firstOccurrence = new AtomicLong(ct);
178      this.lastOccurrence = new AtomicLong(ct);
179   }
180
181   /**
182    * Copy constructor.
183    */
184   private ThrownStats(ThrownStats x) {
185      this.guid = x.guid;
186      this.thrownClass = x.thrownClass;
187      this.firstMessage = x.firstMessage;
188      this.stackTrace = listBuilder(x.stackTrace).copy().unmodifiable().build();
189      this.causedBy = Utils.opt(x.causedBy.isPresent() ? x.causedBy.get().clone() : null);
190      this.hash = x.hash;
191      this.count = new AtomicInteger(x.count.get());
192      this.firstOccurrence = new AtomicLong(x.firstOccurrence.get());
193      this.lastOccurrence = new AtomicLong(x.lastOccurrence.get());
194   }
195
196   /**
197    * Returns a globally unique ID for this object.
198    *
199    * <p>
200    * A random long generated during the creation of this object.
201    * Allows this object to be differentiated from other similar objects in multi-node environments so that
202    * statistics can be reliably stored in a centralized location.
203    *
204    * @return The globally unique ID for this object.
205    */
206   public long getGuid() {
207      return guid;
208   }
209
210   /**
211    * Returns a hash of this exception that can typically be used to uniquely identify it.
212    *
213    * @return A hash of this exception.
214    */
215   public long getHash() {
216      return hash;
217   }
218
219   /**
220    * Returns the exception class.
221    *
222    * @return The exception class.
223    */
224   public Class<?> getThrownClass() {
225      return thrownClass;
226   }
227
228   /**
229    * Returns the number of times this exception occurred at a specific location in code.
230    *
231    * @return The number of times this exception occurred at a specific location in code.
232    */
233   public int getCount() {
234      return count.intValue();
235   }
236
237   /**
238    * Returns the UTC time of the first occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
239    *
240    * @return The UTC time of the first occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
241    */
242   public long getFirstOccurrence() {
243      return firstOccurrence.longValue();
244   }
245
246   /**
247    * Returns the UTC time of the last occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
248    *
249    * @return The UTC time of the last occurrence of this exception at a specific location in code.
250    */
251   public long getLastOccurrence() {
252      return lastOccurrence.longValue();
253   }
254
255   /**
256    * Returns the message of the first exception at a specific location in code.
257    *
258    * @return The message of the first exception at a specific location in code.
259    */
260   public String getFirstMessage() {
261      return firstMessage;
262   }
263
264   /**
265    * Returns the stack trace of the first exception at a specific location in code.
266    *
267    * @return The stack trace of the first exception at a specific location in code.
268    */
269   public List<String> getStackTrace() {
270      return stackTrace;
271   }
272
273   /**
274    * Returns the stats on the caused-by exception.
275    *
276    * @return The stats on the caused-by exception, never <jk>null</jk>.
277    */
278   public Optional<ThrownStats> getCausedBy() {
279      return causedBy;
280   }
281
282   /**
283    * Increments the occurrence count of this exception.
284    *
285    * @return This object.
286    */
287   public ThrownStats increment() {
288      count.incrementAndGet();
289      lastOccurrence.set(System.currentTimeMillis());
290      causedBy.ifPresent(ThrownStats::increment);
291      return this;
292   }
293
294   @Override /* Object */
295   public String toString() {
296      return Json5.of(this);
297   }
298
299   @Override /* Object */
300   public ThrownStats clone() {
301      return new ThrownStats(this);
302   }
303}
